text:
- [Instructor] Now that you're
done with this tutorial,

you may want to delete the
Amplify resources so that

you won't be charged for any
AWS resources being used.
When you use the Amplify Framework

or the Libraries Command Line
Interface and UI Components,

you're only paying for the
underlying AWS services you use.

For example, Amazon
DynamoDB for the database

or Amazon Cognito for
the user authentication;

there's no additional
charges for Amplify itself.
And then Amplify's web hosting is priced
you can see more information about that.

You can delete an Amplify
app in two different ways.

First, you can go to Actions
here, then select Delete app.

You can also go to your
command line interface
